description: Test suite for the newsdataClient module, including parameter normalization, endpoint selection, pagination token handling, and fetch retry logic.

methods.name: normalizeParams
methods.description: Normalizes input query parameters for API requests, trimming strings and converting empty strings or 'all' categories to undefined.

methods.name: chooseEndpointPath
methods.description: Determines the API endpoint path based on normalized query parameters (e.g., '/latest' or '/news').

methods.name: tokenParam
methods.description: Generates the pagination token parameter, typically using 'page' as the key.

methods.name: fetchArticles
methods.description: Fetches news articles from the API, handling pagination, retries upon specific error codes, and omitting tokens on retries.
